title: Tim and Nick Help the Community!
description:
Watch the video here! http://bit.ly/1IZU7LW


Get everything early here: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=gameovergreggy

This video was edited on an ORIGIN PC EVO15-S Laptop. Get you PC here www.ORIGINPC.com.


Buy our shirts! http://www.districtlines.com/gameovergreggy

Each and every Friday, Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Nick Scarpino, and Tim Gettys get together to talk. Each podcaster brings a topic to the table, and then, they go. TV, space, books, movies -- anything goes.

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys

transcript_chunks.text: hey guys want to find creative ways to help get involved in our beautiful San Francisco community of course they do Tim because that sounds wonderful it really really does but we went around the city with pivot TV and showed them all of our favorite spots and found a couple of cool ways we can support local community projects we learned about a really really cool one called the San Francisco Yellow Bike Project which was awesome yeah it was and we rode bikes we did all these cool things see how you can help someone reduce their carbon footprint at takepart.com it's your town we're all passionate about something so help us take that passion and turn it into an opportunity to get involved in your area mhm get involved and check out our video at takepart.com yourtown thanks guys
